We're getting ready to release 1.10.0 of Heritrix.  We're finishing up 
the last few Bugs and RFEs.

You can see of what the release is comprised by querying the sourceforge 
issue tracker using a 'group' of 1.10.0 with the 'status' tab set to 
'Any'.  For the list of Bugs, see 
http://sourceforge.net/tracker/?atid=539099&group_id=73833&func=browse.  
For the list of RFEs, see 
http://sourceforge.net/tracker/?atid=539102&group_id=73833&func=browse  
(Of those items still open, if assigned to Karl (karl-ia), they are 
pending QA review.  If assigned otherwise and of priority 7 or above, 
they're still being worked on).

Are there Bugs or RFEs the list considers critical to any 1.10.0 release?

Thanks,
St.Ack

P.S. 1.10.0 should be out sometime early in September.
